products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.
